verse.name: v1
verse.lines: From every stormy wind that blows, From every swelling tide of woes, There is a calm, a sure retreat: 'Tis found beneath the mercy seat.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: There is a scene where spirits blend, Where friend holds fellowship with friend; Tho' sundered far, by faith they meet Around one common mercy seat.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: There, there on eagles' wings we soar, And sin and sense molest no more. And heav'n comes down our souls to greet, When glory crowns the mercy seat.
